compose:
services:

  sglang_0:
    image: lmsysorg/sglang:latest
    container_name: sglang_0
    entrypoint: python3 -m sglang.launch_server
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: all
              capabilities: [gpu]
    volumes:
      - /hf_models:/hf_models
    environment:
      - HUGGING_FACE_HUB_TOKEN=***
      - HF_HOME=/hf_models
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
    shm_size: '16gb'
    ipc: host
    command: >
      --trust-remote-code
      --mem-fraction-static 0.9
      --host 0.0.0.0
      --port 8000
      --tp 1
      --dp 1
      --model-path QuantTrio/Qwen3-Coder-30B-A3B-Instruct-AWQ
      --served-model-name QuantTrio/Qwen3-Coder-30B-A3B-Instruct-AWQ
      --context-length 8192
      --max-running-requests 16
      --quantization moe_wna16
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "bash", "-c", "curl -f http://localhost:8000/health"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 180
      start_period: 600s
